long_description: Stein Mart, Inc. a specialty off-price retailer, offers designer and name-brand fashion apparels, home dÃ©cor merchandise, accessories, and shoes at everyday discount prices in the United States. The companyâ€™s stores also provide merchandise locator services; a preferred customer program; co-branded and private label credit card programs; and electronic gift cards. As of November 18, 2019, it operated 283 stores in 30 states. The company also sells its products through an e-commerce retail selling site. Stein Mart, Inc. was founded in 1908 and is headquartered in Jacksonville, Florida.
